segments.text: I'm really confused , Zina . Will you explain all this to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , we need to have the Stars.com account , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . If we get it , we'll really be set for success .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And to get it , we have to beat WebTracker to the punch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'm with you so far .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's why I promised that invoking would be up and running by the end of next week .
segments.speaker: S2
